metadata.title: CVE-2021-44879 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In gc_data_segment in fs/f2fs/gc.c in the Linux kernel before 5.16.3,special files are not considered, leading to a move_data_page NULL pointerdereference.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
